about_the_game:
Embark on an epic musical journey in Stolen Realm with the breathtaking soundtrack composed by Jennifer Jolley, featuring additional orchestration by Mat Campbell. Dive into the heart-pounding rhythms and immersive melodies that dynamically support the gameplay and storyline, meticulously crafted to enhance your open-world adventure.

Immerse yourself in the spellbinding soundscape, where each track tells a story of its own. Whether you're exploring uncharted territories or engaging in battles, the music elevates each moment, drawing you deeper into the Stolen Realm Universe.
